title: Finance(Non-us)
content:
üìå **This feature is only available for** [MCN](650a39fe0fcef602bf26c0d3)**,** [CAP](6789f71c23ae4b030c389d61)**,** [TAP](6789f710c0833b0310f153f0) **partners on TTSPC**. Available Market: UK,ID,MY,VN,TH,PH,SG ## What is FinanceÔºü Finance feature enables MCN& TAP to check and export orders and bills after sharing commission with Creator ## „ÄêPayment account„ÄëActive account and links to bank account ### **Activate Account** **‚ë† If you are Cross-border partners** You can go to [finance]-[payment account] to active account *If you are a cross border affiliate partner and have categories in different markets,you need to choose market and active account separately for each market. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/bd7778e2d9ad4f64b12ff5b49fdc4dfc~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/ea43f26c39d64008ae2eaa46ed33dd08~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) After clicking active account,you can check the results(including: active/failed/pending) of different markets. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/caee4bbc1f41450aa6b3a25c7484c8a3~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) **‚ë° If you are SEA local partners** You can go to [finance]-[payment account] to active account for each category. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/c8f060f00899430aa669707701a93e74~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/c9a845c40fff498f841055c628ecdf11~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) After clicking active account,you can check the results(including: active/failed/pending)
### **Link bank account** After active account, you can link a bank account or payoneer. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/3b0aa85b793244b1b8a1a1b15c198756~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/c468393242034fa884abe757713ff07d~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) **Case 1: If you are a cross-border partner, you need link payoneer account** (Haven't opened payoneer yet? [How to Register & Link a Payoneer Account for Cross-Border Institutions?](https://bytedance.feishu.cn/docx/doxcnozAtp8rPP7CVduyPshlUug)Please follow this process to open)
**Case 2 If you are a local partner, you need link bank accounts** Please provide the relevant information about the bank card . Click continue after completion **NoteÔºöThe bank name of the bank card must be consistent with the entity name of the partner** ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/c31d4b2343e143c291ad1703dd3e1bda~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/432af3cdbb5d49cf9caebac9bf7adc99~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) You can check the link bank information and change account after successfully linking. **How to change accountÔºü** After clicking **[Change account]**, you can click **manage** and choose a bank account to set primary. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/fad5c7c7ff0d430a9dd7a8e557409ef4~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/911ebbe365c249468e8be98bab51254b~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ## „ÄêEarnings„ÄëCheck Commission Order You can check commission order under **[earnings]** tab Note: **[earnings]** tab will show all the commission orders from **the creators who have a commission settlement relationship with MCN**
**Step 2 Check Commission Order** You can check the overview of **Commission Order** at the topÔºåincluding * paidÔºàsuccessful paid orders),you can go to[paid] tab to check details * Not paid(including pending payment and payment failed orders ),you can go to [pending payment] and[payment failed] tab to check details
**Step 3 Check and export order details** * You can view the order details under [Payment pending], [Payment made], and [Payment failed]. * You can filter by username, product id, order created time,order delivered time
* Click [Export] to support full export or batch exportÔºàEither choose filters or all order under current tab. **250000 orders maximum at onceÔºâ**
### **Description of earnings field:** | Field name | Description | | --- | --- | | Order ID | Main (SKU) order ID | | Orderline ID | Sub(SKP)order ID.
üìå Note: creator side order is orderline ID | | Creator | Creator profile /username/nickname | | Product | Product picture, name, specification, product ID. | | Sales price & Quantity | Product Sale Price & Quantity | | Content Type | Including live stream, short video and showcase
-You can click live room/ short video to jump to the detailed page
-You can check the promotion ID (which is video id/live room idÔºâafter downloading the data. | | Commission Rate | Commission rate set by seller | | Commission bonus rate | Rate of the commission bonus funded by TikTok | | Est.Commission Base | The estimated commission base is the product sale price multiplied by the number of products sold when the order is created.
The estimated commission base = Sale price*Order Quantity | | Est. total commission | The estimated commission is the amount of estimated commission base multiplied by the commission rate. | | Est. commission bonus | The estimated commission bonus is the amount of estimated commission base multiplied by the commission bonus rate.( including refund orders) | | Actual Commission Base | The actual commission base is the product sale price multiplied by the number of products sold, excluding returned and refunded orders.
The actual commission base= product price*ÔºàOrder Quantity - Refund QuantityÔºâ(excluding refund orders) | | Agency commission | The actual commission is the amount of actual commission base multiplied by the commission rate | | Agency commission bonus | Actual TikTok-funded commission bonus paid to MCN | | Returns&Refunds | Returns & refunds quantity | | Plan ID | The plan ID of the product | | Time Created | Order creation time | | Time delivered | Order Confirmation Delivery Time | | Time commission paid | The time when the order commission is settled to the bank card | | payment ID | Payment ID can help you with each order to help you to match this order with the payment id on the payment bill page.
**NoteÔºö if there is no payment ID,that means this order is still in progress to be paid** | | Payment method | --- | | Payment account | --- | ## „ÄêPayment bills„Äë**Check Payment Bills** Click payment bills to check the payment details of each order. You can filter order by commission paid time
You can click [export] to export bills
